page.title: 16PUBLIC TRANSPORT SURVEY.
page.content:
MORE THAN ONCE A WEEK. 75% MORE THAN ONCE A MONTH. 0.4% LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH. 24.2% 4.Are you satisfied with the fares and services? YES. 98% NO. 2% 5.What improvements could be madeto the service? "MORE BUSES,CHEAPER FARES." "FASTER BUSES." "BUSES SHOULD COPE BETTER WITH THE WEATHER." "BUSES SHOULD BE MORE PUNCTUAL." "BUSES SHOULD BE CLEANER AND MORE COMFORTABLE." "TIMETABLES COULD BE MADE MORE CLEAR."
In a rural area such the Fens a good bus service is essential. Hopefully the people of the future will have the public transport system they require.
